section.title: Web
section.p: In this module, you can watch videos recorded by native speakers. The goal is to learn how to use a given term in context. Use the search box to find interesting topics.

Based on your learning progress, the app estimates how easy a video might be for you to understand. Videos labeled "Ready to watch" contain only words you already know. Videos marked as "Under 50% of words known" may be more challenging.
Each video comes with a scenario with the list of words used. You can use it for practice and add it to your review list.

section.title: Mobile
section.p: In the mobile version, the videos are arranged by difficulty, starting from the easiest. Tap the search box to see the list of topics and hashtags.
section.note: In the free version, you can watch two videos per day. You can watch an ad to unlock an additional video.
